6 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest\api\jsonapi;
7 
8 use Ubiquity\orm\DAO;
9 use Ubiquity\controllers\rest\RestError;
10 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
11 use Ubiquity\controllers\rest\RestBaseController;
12 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;
13 use Ubiquity\orm\OrmUtils;
14 use Ubiquity\controllers\rest\RestServer;
15 use Ubiquity\controllers\crud\CRUDHelper;
16 
27 abstract class JsonApiRestController extends RestBaseController {
28  const API_VERSION = 'JsonAPI 1.0';
29 
30  protected function _setResource($resource) {
31  $modelsNS = $this->config ["mvcNS"] ["models"];
32  $this->model = $modelsNS . "\\" . $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->getModel ( $resource );
33  }
34 
35  protected function _checkResource($resource, $callback) {
36  $this->_setResource ( $resource );
37  if (class_exists ( $this->model )) {
38  $callback ();
39  } else {
40  $this->_setResponseCode ( 404 );
41  $error = new RestError ( 404, "Not existing class", $this->model . " class does not exists!", Startup::getController () . "/" . Startup::getAction () );
42  echo $this->_format ( $error->asArray () );
43  }
44  }
45 
46  protected function getDatas() {
47  $datas = URequest::getRealInput ();
48  if (sizeof ( $datas ) > 0) {
49  $datas = current ( array_keys ( $datas ) );
50  $datas = json_decode ( $datas, true );
51  $attributes = $datas ["data"] ["attributes"] ?? [ ];
52  if (isset ( $datas ["data"] ["id"] )) {
53  $key = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $this->model );
54  $attributes [$key] = $datas ["data"] ["id"];
55  }
56  $this->loadRelationshipsDatas ( $datas, $attributes );
57  return $attributes;
58  }
59  $this->addError ( 204, 'No content', 'The POST request has no content!' );
60  }
61 
62  protected function loadRelationshipsDatas($datas, &$attributes) {
63  if (isset ( $datas ['data'] ['relationships'] )) {
64  $relationShips = $datas ['data'] ['relationships'];
65  foreach ( $relationShips as $member => $data ) {
66  if (isset ( $data ['data'] ['id'] )) {
67  $m = OrmUtils::getJoinColumnName ( $this->model, $member );
68  $attributes [$m] = $data ['data'] ['id'];
69  }
70  }
71  }
72  }
73 
78  protected function getRestServer(): RestServer {
79  return new JsonApiRestServer ( $this->config );
80  }
81 
82  protected function updateOperation($instance, $datas, $updateMany = false) {
83  $instance->_new = false;
84  return CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $datas, false, $updateMany );
85  }
86 
87  protected function AddOperation($instance, $datas, $insertMany = false) {
88  $instance->_new = true;
89  return CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $datas, false, $insertMany );
90  }
91 
97  public function options(...$resource) {
98  }
99 
106  public function index() {
107  parent::index ();
108  }
109 
120  public function getAll_($resource) {
121  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () {
122  $filter = $this->getCondition ( $this->getRequestParam ( 'filter', '1=1' ) );
123  $pages = null;
124  if (isset ( $_GET ['page'] )) {
125  $pageNumber = $_GET ['page'] ['number'];
126  $pageSize = $_GET ['page'] ['size'] ?? 1;
127  $pages = $this->generatePagination ( $filter, $pageNumber, $pageSize );
128  }
129  $datas = DAO::getAll ( $this->model, $filter, $this->getInclude ( $this->getRequestParam ( 'include', true ) ) );
130  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->get ( $datas, $pages );
131  } );
132  }
133 
142  public function getOne_($resource, $id) {
143  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () use ($id) {
144  $this->_getOne ( $id, true, false );
145  } );
146  }
147 
159  public function getRelationShip_($resource, $id, $member) {
160  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () use ($id, $member) {
161  $relations = OrmUtils::getAnnotFieldsInRelations ( $this->model );
162  if (isset ( $relations [$member] )) {
163  $include = $this->getRequestParam ( 'include', true );
164  switch ($relations [$member] ['type']) {
165  case 'manyToOne' :
166  $this->_getManyToOne ( $id, $member, $include );
167  break;
168  case 'oneToMany' :
169  $this->_getOneToMany ( $id, $member, $include );
170  break;
171  case 'manyToMany' :
172  $this->_getManyToMany ( $id, $member, $include );
173  break;
174  }
175  }
176  } );
177  }
178 
187  public function add_($resource) {
188  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () {
189  parent::_add ();
190  } );
191  }
192 
202  public function update_($resource, ...$id) {
203  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () use ($id) {
204  if (! $this->hasErrors ()) {
205  parent::_update ( ...$id );
206  } else {
207  echo $this->displayErrors ();
208  }
209  } );
210  }
211 
221  public function delete_($resource, ...$id) {
222  $this->_checkResource ( $resource, function () use ($id) {
223  $this->_delete ( ...$id );
224  } );
225  }
226 
232  public static function _getApiVersion() {
233  return self::API_VERSION;
234  }
235 
241  public static function _getTemplateFile() {
242  return 'restApiController.tpl';
243  }
244 }
